tool_description: Test one of the most popular unproven math functions known as The Collatz Conjecture for any number up to 9223372036854775807. Returns each step value along with helpful statistics.
name: Collatz Conjecture
title: Collatz Conjecture

api_list.name: Statistics
api_list.description: Returns statistics from the Collatz Conjecture function given a valid starting number.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Any number less than or equal to 9223372036854775807.

api_list.name: Values
api_list.description: Returns an array of values and step statistics returned from the Collatz Conjecture function given a valid starting number.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Any number less than or equal to 9223372036854775807.
